Defence.Assassin's Vigour: Grants Health after breaking a Behemoth part
Defence.Bloodless: Protects against Wounded and Crippling Wounds statuses.
Defence.Fireproof: Protects against being set on fire.
Defence.Fortress: Grants a small shield after avoiding damage for a short time.
Defence.Guardian: Grants a portion of any shield applied to you to your nearest ally.
Defence.Iceborne: Increases Defense when at low health, and at later ranks, grants life steal
Defence.Insulated: Protects against Shocked status effect and allows you to attack electric shields.
Defence.Nine Lives: Grants a chance to reduce damage, and later the ability to cheat death.
Defence.Shellshock Resist: Protects against the explosion damage and status effect Shellshock.
Defence.Sturdy: Prevents being staggered on a cooldown.
Defence.Warmth: Protects against Chilled and Frozen status effects.

Mobility.Agility: Reduces the stamina cost of dodging.
Mobility.Fleet Footed: Temporarily increases Movement Speed after a dodge.
Mobility.Nimble: Restores Stamina when dodging through behemoth attacks.
Mobility.Swift: Increases Movement Speed when your weapon is sheathed.

Power.Aetherhunter: Increases damage against aether charged Behemoths.
Power.Deconstruction: Bonus damage against objects created by Behemoths.
Power.Pacifier: Increases Stagger damage against enraged Behemoths.
Power.Rage: Increases your damage when your health is low.

Technique.Acidic: Increases Wound damage at the cost of Part damage.
Technique.Adrenaline: Increases damage dealt based on stamina spent.
Technique.Barbed: Adds a flat amount of Wound damage on hit.
Technique.Bladestorm: Adds a flat amount of Part damage on hit.
Technique.Cunning: Grants a chance to deal double damage.
Technique.Evasive Fury: Temporarily increases attack speed when dodging through a Behemoth's attack.
Technique.Merciless: Increases Wound damage against staggered Behemoths.
Technique.Molten: Grants Molten Heart drops on cooldown.
Technique.Predator: Increases damage after avoiding damage for a short time.
Technique.Weighted Strikes: Adds a flat amount of Stagger damage on hit. At later ranks, allows more weapon attacks to interrupt.
Technique.Wild Frenzy: Increases Attack Speed when at low health.

Utility.Aetherborne: Increases the benefits of using aether vents.
Utility.Aetheric Attunement: Percent increase to Lantern Charge gained from attacks.
Utility.Aetheric Frenzy: Gains a flat amount of Lantern Charge on each weapon hit.
Utility.Conduit: Using a Lantern's hold ability increases all Slayers' attack speed temporarily.
Utility.Lucent: Flask heals over time and generates lantern charge
Utility.Medic: Improves your ability to revive allies.
Utility.Stunning Vigour: Restores some health whenever a Behemoth is staggered.
Utility.Vampiric: Restores some health whenever a Behemoth part is Wounded.
